announcements.title: Sunday, January 1st
announcements.description: - 11:30am Ashtanga Yoga and 4:30pm Yoga 1 classes are running at the Squirrel Hill school; the 4pm Yoga 1 is running at the North Hills school; all other classes are cancelled.
